means: 大的厚皮动物（如象和犀牛）

sentence.Network_en: Soar high above Fantasyland aboard everyone s favorite pachyderm.
sentence.Network_cn: 登上人见人爱的小飞象,在幻想世界的天空里展翅高飞.

sentence.Network_en: An pachyderm pictured at Addo Elephant National Park the Eastern Cape region of South Africa.
sentence.Network_cn: 一头大象摄于南非东开普敦地区的阿多大象国家公园.

derivation.yuyuan_name: mid 19th cent.: from French pachyderme, from Greek pakhudermos, from pakhus 'thick' + derma 'skin'

entry.tran: 厚皮动物（如大象、犀牛等）
entry.def: A pachyderm is a large thick-skinned animal such as an elephant or rhinoceros.

means.word_mean: 1. any of various nonruminant hoofed mammals having very thick skin: elephant; rhinoceros; hippopotamus

auth_sentence.content: This reminds me of Ken Miller's hilarious extinct pachyderm fallacy.
